Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, just west of Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: Lankshire Parkway intersects Overland Drive to the east. On the north side of the road, you can see the Khelleva Stables. There is a small road running between the Stables and the Khelleva Mansion, which joins the road at the Lankshire intersection. On the south side of the road, you can see the Iilandi Family Mansion.
